title: Edward St John (cricketer)
text:
Edward St John (8 December 1805 – 17 January 1892) was an English <a href="cricket">cricket</a>er who was associated with <a href="Cambridge%20University%20Cricket%20Club">Cambridge University Cricket Club</a> and made his <a href="first-class%20cricket">first-class</a> debut in 1829.
He was a student at <a href="Downing%20College%2C%20Cambridge">Downing College, Cambridge</a>. After graduating with a <a href="Bachelor%20of%20Laws">LLB</a> degree in 1831 he became a Church of England <a href="priest">priest</a> and was <a href="Rector%20%28ecclesiastical%29">rector</a> of Finchampstead from 1841 until his death in 1892.
